body: I want it in English please 🙏
Pxz and Pxz2 were the shit to play. Even their"prequel" games before were totes great

Just wanna say that while the Xenosaga tag IS appropriate, this is actually for Project X Zone 2, the most recent of the crossover(s) between various series and franchises. The cover even has the engineer chick, and she's a PXZ2-original character. ...And I'm not 100% sure, but I think that blonde bunny girl is too.
Project X Zone sweet. Speaking of which I want to see the first Namco X Capcom get ported to the States, maybe for the 3DS or Switch. <3
